name: Widow_Training.Fortunata_Training
display_help: Fortunata's have a wide array of extremely potent psychic attacks and controls.

powers.name: Widow_Training.Fortunata_Training.FRT_Mental_Blast
powers.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: -30.00% strength to recharge for 6s on target

powers.name: Widow_Training.Fortunata_Training.FRT_Telekinetic_Blast
powers.display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 60.00% chance for 7.5 magnitude knock on target
60.00% chance for 7.5 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Widow_Training.Fortunata_Training.FRT_Subdue
powers.display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 80.00% chance for 3.0 immobilize for 8.05s on target
80.00% chance for 3.0 immobilize for 2s on target

powers.name: Widow_Training.Fortunata_Training.FRT_Aim
powers.display_help: Greatly increases your chance to hit with attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

display_info: 50.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Widow_Training.Fortunata_Training.FRT_Psychic_Scream
powers.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 60 ft. radius 30° arc (12 targets max)

display_info: -50.00% strength to recharge for 10s on target

powers.name: Widow_Training.Fortunata_Training.FRT_Dominate
powers.display_help: Painfully tears at the mind of a single foe. Dominate deals Psionic damage and renders a foe helpless, lost in his own mind and unable to defend himself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Widow_Training.Fortunata_Training.FRT_Psionic_Lance
powers.display_help: Unleashes a whirlwind of Psionic energy on a target, tossing nearby foes into the air. The Psionic Tornado damages foes and Slows their attack speed. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DoT(Psionic), Foe Knockback

display_info: 5 ticks of 11.31 psionic damage over 4.1s on target
-30.00% strength to recharge for 10s on target
5 ticks of 8.06 psionic damage over 4.1s on target
50.00% chance for 1.4 magnitude knockup on target
50.00% chance for 1.4 magnitude knockup on target

powers.name: Widow_Training.Fortunata_Training.FRT_Scramble_Thoughts
powers.display_help: Painfully scrambles the synapses of a targeted foe, leaving him dramatically Disoriented for a short duration. Deals a little Psionic Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Widow_Training.Fortunata_Training.FRT_Total_Domination
powers.display_help: Tears at the mind of a target foe and those near him. Total Domination renders all affected foes helpless, lost in their own minds and unable to defend themselves. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Widow_Training.Fortunata_Training.FRT_Psychic_Wail
powers.display_help: Psychic Wail is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

display_info: -70.00% strength to recharge for 20s on target
